name: Panos Kalodimas Master
body:
###Welcome
This is [Panos Kalodimas]( https://gr.linkedin.com/in/pkalodimas) master course in the [Technical University of Crete](http://www.tuc.gr), [Department of Electronics and Computer Engineers](http://www.ece.tuc.gr), Chania, Crete web page. In this page information and links over my master course are presented.

###Projects
During the master courses in the Technical University of Crete, two projected and the master thesis were completed. In the following links the documentation of these project can be found.
+ [Special Topics in Electric Measurements Systems Project Documentation](https://github.com/pkalodimas/Master/raw/master/ACE%20602/Electric%20Measurements%20Systems%20Project%20-%20Kalodimas.pdf) (Greek language)
+ [Machine Learning Project Documentation](https://github.com/pkalodimas/Master/raw/master/COMP%20613/Machine%20Learning%20-%20Panos%20Kalodimas.pdf) (English language)
+ [Master Thesis Web Page](https://pkalodimas.github.io/Master-Thesis/)
+ [Master Thesis Documentation](https://github.com/pkalodimas/Master/raw/master/Master%20Thesis/TSM%20Face%20Detection%20System.pdf) (English language)
+ [Master Full Documentation](https://github.com/pkalodimas/Master/raw/master/Master/Master%20-%20Panos%20Kalodimas.pdf) (English language)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
